EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! You Can Beat the Rush for Solar in Rhode Island
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're ready to sail into solar! Are you?
Start selling solar systems before the rush!
While the Rhode Island Renewable Energy Growth Program does not open new capacity until April 2018, BlueWave Solar is ready to receive applicants now.
Solar will be selling faster than Del's on a hot summer day, don't miss out!
Contact Dave, Senior Director of Business Development, to learn more: dwells@bluewavesolar.com.
STAY IN THE KNOW: This year, National Grid will be posting weekly updates on the amount of capacity remaining in the Renewable Energy Growth Program. You can sign up for notifications to stay up to date by scrolling to the bottom of this page.
We are dedicated to your succss:
Simple online portal: Add and manage your customers easily online. Sales based incentives: We have a volume-based reward program for sales representatives to celebrate their work. A Proven Track Record: To date, we have developed over 100MW of solar projects and manage over 900 solar loan customers. BlueWave Partner Support: We're here for you 7 days a week from 8am-8pm by phone (888) 817-2703 or partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com.
BlueWave Solar Loan Features for Customers
No money down: Pay nothing during system installation period. 18-Month interest only period: Upfront savings after installation. No penalties for early repayment: Pay down your loan as quickly as you like! Automated online bill-pay: Seamless and secure access. Personal BlueWave Customer Care: Provided for the length of the loan.
